summary: App flow includes a Contact/Submit action that should open WhatsApp to send the user’s submitted form info to the owner’s number via a pre-filled message (wa.me link).
architectural_notes: WhatsApp integration will be implemented by opening a wa.me link with a pre-filled message; the app cannot auto-send WhatsApp messages directly.
known_issues: Contact/Submit button not working properly (needs to be fixed as part of WhatsApp submit flow).

existing_features.title: Update the Contact Us form submit flow so that when the user presses the Submit/Register button, the app opens a WhatsApp chat to the owner number 918829921156 using a wa.me link with a pre-filled message containing the submitted form details (full name, phone number, and city).

Fix the Contact form UX so it no longer only shows an in-app 'received your information' confirmation without sending/opening WhatsApp; instead, after a successful validation, it must initiate the WhatsApp open action and provide a clear on-page indication if the WhatsApp window/tab could not be opened (e.g., popup blocked) with guidance to use the displayed link/button to open WhatsApp manually.

new_feature_requests.summary: On form Submit, open WhatsApp chat to owner number with all form data pre-filled in the message (wa.me link).

projectName: Fix Contact form submit to open WhatsApp chat with pre-filled lead details
